message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,000. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Hi Alice, thanks for showing me the product. I'm interested, but $11,000 is a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $9,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about we settle on $10,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway.  I'm getting closer to my budget, but $10,500 is still a bit high. How about $9,500?
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to get to your budget, but I'm not willing to go below $10,000. I'll give you a slight discount, though. How about we meet at $10,250?
Hi Alice, I appreciate the discount.  $10,000 does seem fair, but I'm trying to stay under $10,000.  Would you be willing to do $9,750?
Hi Bob, I understand you're trying to stay under $10,000, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'll give you another discount, though. How about we meet at $10,100?
